name: IB_CALL_ACTION
description: The IB_CALL_ACTION table contains the actions needed to be taken to follow-up on a telephone encounter.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the In Basket Message.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line number to identify the call action within an In Basket Message.

columns.name: CALL_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with select actions that summarize the phone call and its necessary follow-up.
